title: Both Eyes Open and Both Eyes Shut
features: Life can be a complicated puzzle requiring careful evaluation. Both Eyes Open and Both Eyes Shut is an inspiring book helping introspective readers gain insight and information. Most people focus on negative experiences throughout life, while blindsided concerning the things of God. This book has the potential to change lives and impact all ages, races, and genders that are navigating through the maze of life.
description: I thank everyone who have took the time to review my page, I thank you all from the bottom of my heart, this has been a long journey that I have enjoyed taking and I would like to thank my editor and publisher Anthony KaDarrell Thigpen for helping my dreams come true and for his professionalism along the way. And I would like thank Antwone Whiteside for bringing my vision to pass. I thank everyone that has bought a copy of Both Eyes Open and Both Eyes Shut and for any of those who plan to purchase this book in the future. Thank You and God Bless You             Author Corwin C. Johnson

In 2000 I began writing this book, and the Both Eyes Open and Both Eyes Shut the concept just stuck with me over the years. I would put the book down and pick it up again and over time the more I grew in the word of God the more I had to add to content. I went back and forth with this project for awhile and eventually I was lead to do what was meant for me to do and that was to put out the first issue of Both Eyes Shut and Both Eyes Shut and it has opened so many doors for me in just a short time, it has been an exciting experience and I pray that the other 2 volumes will be just as fun writing along with the other writings that I have in my binds that has been storing my notebooks for years. This is only the beginning, I hope that you all will ride along with in God speed.

RIP to my father who died exactly one week after this book was published. Love you! This book has been in the making over the last 16years and I thank God for this great opportunity and I believe this is just the beginning. Volume 2 and 3 of Both Eyes Open and Both Eyes Shut are on the horizon "Why Am I So Comfortable Living In My Sins" and Win/Lose/No Draw "Dealing With Spiritual Warfare" with "A Real Man\'s Hustle" coming in the fall of 2016.']}
